1112.content:
You wake up in a area that is unfamiliar to you. The ground is cold, smooth and black. With a shock you realize your standing on a massive Coffee Table. The ground shakes around as a massive blonde bunny Goddess enters the room. "That...that can't be Lola!" you think "She's just....just a cartoon"

"Oh, your finally up!" The giant rabbit said, her voice nearly blowing your ears out. "Now we can get started!" She kicked her massive her massive sneakers off and relaxed on the couch. "Start rubbing" She simply commanded.

Her white toes wriggled high above your head, and you are both terrified and aroused at the same time. "Well? What are you waiting for? Or do you you need some motivation?" She quickly pins you beneath one of her toes "If you don't rub them, you'll get mashed beneath them."

Your completely terrified, but you manage to collect yourself. This is clearly the Space Jam version of Lola, which means she definitely would punish you. Heck, she nearly killed Bugs for calling her "Doll". So...do you obey her, or run and risk the chance of being crushed under those beautiful toes?

1131.content:
(Written by Albo)

Here you are, shrunk and standing on a coffee table. Above you Lola sat on a couch that's situated in front of the coffee table. Lola had closed her eyes and is waiting to see if she can trust you to do your current task. Right in front of you lay her large rabbit feet placed at the heel. Three massive fluffy looking toes of white coloring. Each toe had a pink pad right below it with a fourth pad at Lola's heel. Beyond the underside, Lola's feet were light brown, the same as the top of her foot right after her toes. Under normal circumstances you'd say that this would be an easy task. But given the situation, you are shrunk so it's going to be more strenuous. You saw Lola's foot twitch a bit expectantly, signalling that you better get started.

Placing a hand on Lola's sole you felt a slight amount of warmth radiate from it. Upon touching the surface you got a reaction, Lola sighing in pleasure. "Sensitive..." you couldn't help but think. You began your motions along the center of one of Lola's feet. Up and down you went running both of your hands across the surface of the bunny woman's lower appendage. The fur on her sole was somewhat tingly on your hands. You kept going trying to make sure you did a good job. Noticing her pads you couldn't help but notice how you've ignored them so far.

To remedy this, you decided to rub Lola's pads as well. You pressed your hands in each of them like they were buttons and if you thought Lola was sensitive before you couldn't help but notice how she opened her mouth but oddly enough no sound came through. No doubt her pads were the most sensitive part of her feet. Getting an idea you continued to do as you did and pressed down on the pad down at her heel. You followed up your action by keeping your position and went in a circle along the pad all the while your hands stayed pressed against the pad. To top it off you gathered as much air as your little lungs could inhale and then you let it all out directly onto the pad you were working on:

"Ah!"

Came Lola's voice from above. No doubt she was very much enjoying the pampering she was receiving. Lola couldn't believe what she was experiencing. Truth be told at first glance she did not expect her day to turn out like this. And when assigning this task to a shrunken individual she never expected the results to be so favorable. Someone so small should by all means not be able to satisfy her due simply to their small stature. But the evidence speaks for itself as she forms a little smirk. Soon enough she feels you digging your small hands onto her other remaining foot. Lola could feel you try a new tactic sending waves of pleasure across her foot. Little bursts of impact collided with her sole. You were punching her foot since at your small height you couldn't damage it. Lola's smirk widened as she liked the sensation and the originality you were bringing to the massage. If anything she wouldn't mind encouraging you to get even rougher, but rather than do that Lola opened her mouth to moan.

As you punched out Lola's remaining foot and heard her moan you knew you were doing fine. Lola was approving, if she didn't approve she'd probably fiercely stomp on you with her foot. Although given how soft her furred feet were, you couldn't help but wonder if they were tough enough to snuff a life out. Then again would you be durable enough to handle such a harmful action? A shudder worked its way through your spine as you'd rather not find out. To end your massage, you paid attention to the gaps in between Lola's toes. And lucky for you, you found....nothing. They were clean, they didn't even smell. Scratch that, it did smell, but not of sweat or anything of the sort. Rather it smelled of scented carrots. "She keeps herself groomed." you couldn't help but think. There was nothing to pick at so you rubbed as thoroughly as you could. Her toes twitched in excitement. But you found yourself stopping when you heard Lola say from above:

"That's enough."

You did as you were told and ceased. Additionally you backed away from Lola's feet and put some distance between them and yourself. Looking upwards you saw Lola's face. The woman looked satisfied. There was no hint that she did not enjoy any of the massage on her face. In fact when she asked you to stop she did not sound upset. However, that isn't to say that Lola couldn't be lying, though it's not likely. Regardless what does Lola plan on doing?
1131.title: Playful Lola

11312.content:
"That's good enough for tonight, little guy. Did a better job than expected, too." Her large, gloved hand reached out for you, picking your small form up rather suddenly before pulling you her close to her face. She gave you a small peck on the top of your head, but to you, her lips enveloped the entire top of your head. Nonetheless, you appreciated the gesture. The giant bunny stretched out a bit, yawning deeply and smacking her lips. She appeared to be quite tired. You felt the same after massaging her feet.
"I'm a bit worn out from today, y'know. Basketball practice can be pretty tough." She pulled back her feet from the table and plopped them on one arm of the couch, putting her head on the other arm.
"Anyway, I'm gonna sleep. You can sleep wherever." She laid you down on her toned stomach before nestling her hand under her head. "Just don't get too reckless, alright?" She didn't even wait for an answer before yawning again and closing her eyes.
You were getting pretty sleepy as well, so you made the decision to sleep on...

1243.content:
Last night's events were as normal as you could recall. Having just arrived back home from an exhausting day at work, you quickly kicked off your shoes, ate leftovers from yesterdays dinner, and went straight to bed afterwards. This was the routine of your life at the moment. Your legs and feet were incredibly sore, the only thing you wished was to sleep it through the cold night.

The wind howled, and the chilly air seeped into the bedroom. Instinctively turning onto your side, hugging tightly at your blankets. Eyes feeling heavy, light becoming dim. It wasn't long before your body finally gave in, and you slept soundly in your bed. The cool wind seemed to have subsided, as your body temperature was quite warm as you awoke. Lifting yourself up, It was then the texture of the bed felt different.. A lot stiffer than before, and now that you begin noticing it, your blankets were no where near to be felt..

Opening your eyes, you found yourself outside in a unfamiliar setting. The bed you slept in was now an outdoor bench, leaning rather close to the wall. and quite a large one at that. Looking up at it felt almost tower like, making you feel a bit uneasy. You quickly turned your gaze downward, looking straight across from where you stood. The green tower like walls shaped into a long rectangle, to your right, was a fence door. Taking a few steps closer to the edge, there also appeared to be long white lines upon the ground. and in the middle of those lines farther away from bench, was a net. If the set up didn't make it obvious enough, you had found yourself in a tennis court. Your mind started to race quickly, just how, and why were you here? and how come you were so small? The cold and harsh environment of which you were residing was long gone, almost feeling like a dream, if this wasn't one..

Before the thoughts could begin finalizing in your head, a green bouncing tennis ball was headed your way at a rapid speed. having almost no time to react accordingly, you yelped as the ball hit you hard, and everything faded to black.
________________________________

You woke up once again, a small, but noticeable pain pounding in your head made itself known. You grunted to yourself, placing your hands over your head.. "Oh! you're awake! Are you okay little guy?" You lifted your head to face where the voice came from. Needless to say, you were quite shocked. What you could only assume was an anthropomorphic rabbit, towered above you with a look of concern. Judging from her expression, it was safe to say that there was no harm to be met by this woman, but her rather tall height made her look somewhat intimidating. Which would soon disappear.. Her hair was blonde, the style was bangs. Just above her eyes was a blue sweatband, which matched the colors of her shirt and skirt. Her fur was tan, matched with small white gloves.

"That ball really hit you hard! Not that I was the one who hit the ball, I mean, I did.. Technically, but not on purpose, I swear! I just haven't gotten the hang of this sport." The young rabbit went on.

"If you hadn't yelled, I wouldn't have seen you. Speaking of you.. You're actually kinda cute!"

Her hand moved closer to your position, her hand stretched out with a finger. To which she began to gently rub your stomach, similar to how one would pet an animal. You were a bit overwhelmed considering the situation, but it was not like you could do much to stop her.. And it did feel a little nice too.

Her long eyelashes batted rapidly for a moment, as she giggled to herself before stopping. "I'm Lola bunny by the way." She spoke up, distracting you from the small enjoyment you had experienced. She withdrew her finger, and curiosity began to grow inside Lola "I've honestly never seen a human like you so small before, you should come with me. Just in case someone, I don't know, steps on you, or sits down. That would be bad, probably a LOT safer with me though."

Despite that you didn't know the woman, she was the only around who was very willing to help you out. That is, if you could get a chance to explain yourself..
1243.title: Strange Meeting

12431.content:
Being off by yourself without the aid of another could put you in dangerous situations like the rabbit herself said. Especially with your height in mind, anything simple would be five times difficult, if not more. The choice was obvious, you let Lola lead the way, hopefully to somewhere safe and sound. The mention of other humans did put yourself in some sort of high hopes, maybe you weren't as far away from home as it seemed?

"Alright little guy, lets go!"

Lola gently lifts you up with the tips of her thumb and index finger. Her gloved fingers wrapping around your tiny form in a secure grasp. The texture white glove did more than it's share of keeping you safe. Feeling soft, and almost pillow like, It was hard to not get comfortable. Leaning down, Lola had reached for her tennis racquets in the other hand. Leaving the bounds of the tennis court behind you two.

Following the path of a walkway. The wide, stretched out field of trimmed grass, the warm fresh air, not at all like the bitter cold winter you were in. A gentle breeze tickled your skin while soaking in this new environment. Cooling your skin in the heat of the sun's warmth. In response, a sigh was let out from behind you. Turning your gaze to face Lola, you had intended to ask the girl a few questions, until a distinctive aroma was emanating from her. It was not strong smell necessary, had it not been for the wind, you wouldn't have noticed it. You identified it as some kind of perfume or deodorant, but the other side of the coin was that it was reminiscent of sweat. Being so close to Lola's large body, you took the chance to glance over her, at least what you could see. She didn't even appear to have worked herself into a exhausted state.


"Say Lola, I..uh.." The weight of the conversation hits you. For all you know, this whole thing could just be in your head. You don't magically teleport in some drastically unfamiliar area. Or, for if's sake, it's actually happening, then how? why?. (that tennis ball felt pretty convincing) So without saying much about where you previously were, you start off slow. hopefully to grasp exactly what's happening. You don't want to come off as crazy, even if your story does sound unbelievable.

"Where are we, exactly?"

"R.O.G.O.O.O.C.C." Lola replied flatly.

"Wha-What? what does that mean?"

"Royal Oaks Glen Oaks Oakwood Oaks Country Club, of course! Me, my parents visit here every once and awhile, there's a pool, a golf course, a tennis court, but I think you already knew that part."

You simply nod, letting Lola continue on as she begins to eventually ramble. fortunately, you weren't too lost in her words. She mentioned off the cuff that the tennis court was also where she met her 'true love', some guy named Bugs. A strange name.. And that she hadn't seen him for few weeks now. With that, each word slowly seemed to drag her mood down. "Does he still love me?" "Will I ever see him again?" "Does he have a new girlfriend?"

You don't even know what direction this is heading. All you wanted to know was where you were. Not that you're upset at Lola, but this just coming out of nowhere, you don't even know her all that well. So to say the least, this is quite awkward..

"Lola.."

"What if she's better than me?"

"Lola please-"

"Like, some kind of famous actress! or super model? They could already be engaged, and I wouldn't know!"

"LOLA!"

Finally, she stops. Giving you a quick look to her hand.

"You're.. squeezing, me.."

"Oh, sorry..I kinda got lost in thought.." she chuckles nervously. You can tell she's genuinely sorry, your well being however,is on the line. You don't wish yourself to be physically hurt by this stranger. Lola notices this, and halts her steps on the side walk. You considered asking her what she was doing, but before you could, she took her newly formed idea into motion.

You were moved right above Lola's chest, her fingers slowly but carefully inserting the lower half of your body between her fur covered breasts. You began to object, but once the touch of her soft, and warm fur made contact, your lips held shut. Your body went smoothly between her breasts, leaving the upper half of your body in the clear. The softness of Lola's fur was beyond words, and much better than her hand had been comparatively. Yet, it was in such an intimate part.. Conflicting thoughts were running through your head. It was Lola's booming voice above you that redirected your attention.

"This will work until we get home, and then we can figure this whole thing out! sound good? I mean.. Unless you KNOW someone around here, I and I didn't know"

"It's fine, uhh, I really need some time to think, so your place sounds great.."
12431.title: Go With Lola

info.brief_description: What happens when you shrink around Lola Bunny (or two of them)?
info.description:
This interactive will be a bit more direct than most of my other stories, although there will be story, the story will focus much more directly on the actions between Lola and the shrinkee.

Rules
1. Size once it has been established is fixed, the character can't fluctuate from being the size of a speck to fitting comfortably in the palm of her hand.
2. Any person can be used, and a name can be give for 1st and 3rd person, however once a name is given, that's the character's name.
3. 5 4-sentence paragraphs minimum per chapter.
4. Any type of interaction is allowed including the more extreme options.
5. Encouraged fetishes:foot/paw play, multiple giantess (there's two different Lolas let's use them), foot, butt, breast squish.
6. Have fun

Concerning sizes:
For Lola to be more of a giantess her space jam incarnation will stand 5ft 10in rather than her usual 3ft 5 while her Looney Tunes Show incarnation will stand 5ft 7 compared to her usual 3ft 2. To give a frame of reference for the main character's size a Barbie doll is 11.5 inches tall, if the main character is 4 inches tall they would be approximately a third that size.
